title: Simon Cowell puts X Factor: Celebrity Love Island contestants on spot
text:
Simon Cowell asks Love Island contestants ‘who’s hooked up’ (Picture: Getty)

Simon Cowell didn’t hold back when first meeting the Love Island contestants on X Factor: Celebrity.

That’s right, the music mogul went in with all the questions fans have been dying to ask, and well, it was just a little bit awkward.

Looking all nervous, Eyal Booker, Wes Nelson, Samira Mighty and Zara McDermott took to the stage in anticipation for their singing debut.

And while Louis Walsh was glowing with excitement for their appearance, Simon went and dropped the bombshell.

Without even saying hi, the 60-year-old asked: ‘Who hooked up?’

The music mogul didn’t hold back (Picture: FilmMagic)

Eyal fell flat (Picture: PA)

While the islanders stood there in shock, Samira took the reigns and laughed off his incredibly cringy question.

‘We’re lucky, none of us actually hooked up together. Otherwise, that would have been very awkward wouldn’t it?’ she laughed.

Not as awkward as this situation!

The stars went onto sing Shawn Mendes’ hit There’s Nothing Holding Me Back, and while Eyal fell flat the other three didn’t do half bad.

They’ve got pipes (Picture: Rex)

Impressed with what he saw, Louis said: ‘There’s good chemistry here isn’t there, Simon?’

And it seems the father-of-one was in agreement, as he smiled: ‘You know what? For a first audition, and bearing in mind where you came from, it was a good performance.

‘But it’s now about finding your distinct sound.’

Commenting on their voices, he gushed: ‘But the fact you can all sing…’

Nicole Scherzinger added: ‘It was so good,’ before telling the group they have potential.

X Factor: Celebrity kicks off tonight at 8.25pm on ITV.
